caption.p: ( a) CV plot of NC-doped Mo 2C-NR (Mo 2C-NR@xNC; x = 5, 11, and 16%) for an LOB under an O 2 atmosphere at 0.1 mVs −1. ( b) GCD plot of Mo 2C-NR@xNC (x = 5, 11, and 16%) at 100 mA g −1. ( c) Discharge profile for an LOB with Mo 2C-NR@5%NC. ( d) Discharge profile of an LOB with Mo 2C-NR@11%NC. ( e) Discharge profile of an LOB with Mo 2C-NR@16%NC. ( f) Discharge plot of the control group at 100 mA g −1. ( g, h) Graphical representation of an LOB cell with Mo 2C-NR and Mo 2C-NR@11 NC catalysts [ 133]. Copyright 2018 The American Chemical Society. ( i) FE-SEM image of Mo 2C-C. ( j, k) HR-TEM image of Mo 2C-C and ( l) the corresponding FFT pattern. ( m, n) FE-SEM and HR-TEM images of the control sample carbon. ( o– q) EDS mapping of C and Mo in Mo 2C-C [ 134]. Copyright 2020 Elsevier.
